languages.text: "Глубокое одиночество связывает мон-кай нитями привязанности. Но осколки неисцеленной боли терзают их вновь и вновь, порождая новые раны".

traits.locale_text: "Глубокое одиночество связывает мон-кай нитями привязанности. Но, расцветая кровоточащими ранами, их вновь и вновь терзают осколки неисцеленной боли".

languages.text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."
languages.original_text: "Глубокое одиночество связывает мон-кай нитями привязанности. Но осколки неисцеленной боли терзают их вновь и вновь, порождая новые раны".

traits.locale_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."
"Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."
"Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."
"Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."
"Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

languages.text: "Tiefe Einsamkeit verbindet die Chem-Pan-Sey mit Fäden der Zuneigung. Aber unverheilter Schmerz reißt sie ein ums andere Mal entzwei und erzeugt neue Wunden."
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: "Tiefe Einsamkeit verbindet die Chem-Pan-Sey mit Fäden der Zuneigung. Aber unverheilter Schmerz reißt sie ein ums andere Mal entzwei und erzeugt neue Wunden."

languages.text: « Une profonde solitude enserre le mon-keigh dans les liens de l'affection, mais ils sont sans cesse tranchés par les éclats d'une vieille blessure qui ne s'est jamais refermée et crée à chaque fois de nouvelles plaies. »
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: « Une profonde solitude enserre le mon-keigh dans les liens de l'affection, mais ils sont sans cesse tranchés par les éclats d'une vieille blessure qui ne s'est jamais refermée et crée à chaque fois de nouvelles plaies. »

languages.text: “深切的孤独通过情感的丝线，将猴子们捆缚在一起，但尚未愈合的痛苦碎片会一次次撕裂他们，割出新的伤口。”
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: “深切的孤独通过情感的丝线，将猴子们捆缚在一起，但尚未愈合的痛苦碎片会一次次撕裂他们，割出新的伤口。”

languages.text: «Una soledad profunda ata al mon-keigh con hilos de afecto, pero los fragmentos de dolor sin curar no dejan de cortarlo, creando nuevas heridas».
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: «Una soledad profunda ata al mon-keigh con hilos de afecto, pero los fragmentos de dolor sin curar no dejan de cortarlo, creando nuevas heridas».

languages.text: 「深い孤独がモン＝ケイを愛情の糸で結びつける。だが、癒えぬ痛みの破片が何度も彼らを引き裂き、新たな傷を生むのだ」
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: 「深い孤独がモン＝ケイを愛情の糸で結びつける。だが、癒えぬ痛みの破片が何度も彼らを引き裂き、新たな傷を生むのだ」

languages.text: "Derin bir yalnızlık, mon-keigh'i sevgi iplikleriyle bağlıyor. İyileşmemiş acıların kırıkları ise tekrar tekrar yırtarak yeni yaralar açıyor."
languages.original_text: "Deep loneliness binds the mon-keigh with threads of affection. But shards of unhealed pain tear them again and again, creating new wounds."

traits.locale_text: "Derin bir yalnızlık, mon-keigh'i sevgi iplikleriyle bağlıyor. İyileşmemiş acıların kırıkları ise tekrar tekrar yırtarak yeni yaralar açıyor."
